category: Member Sports Organization Regulations/Article 14 (Composition and Function of the Board of Directors)
contents: Article 14 (Composition and functions of the board of directors) ① The board of directors of a member sports organization shall be composed of the head, vice president, and directors of the member sports organization. ② The board of directors of the member sports organization deliberates and decides on the following matters. Revised 2017. 8. 7., 2019. 12. 20., 2021. 10. 6. 1. Matters related to business plan and budget 2. Enactment and revision of regulations 3. Matters related to incorporation and disposal of basic assets 4. Matters pertaining to the establishment and operation of various committees 5. Matters delegated at the general meeting 6. Matters pertaining to the submission of agenda items to the general meeting 7. Other important matters ③ Deleted March 23, 2017
